title: Baahubali: The Beginning (Malayalam Version)
writer: Vijayendra Prasad, S.S. Rajamouli, C.H. Vijay Kumar
short_cast: Prabhas, Rana Daggubati, Anushka Shetty, Tamanna, Sathyaraj, Nassar, Ramya Krishnan, Sudeep
cast: Prabhas, Rana Daggubati, Anushka Shetty, Tamanna, Sathyaraj, Nassar, Ramya Krishnan, Sudeep
m_desc: Suitable for persons aged 13 and above and under parental guidance for people under age of 13
desc: Villagers in the kingdom of Mahismati rescue a baby who is destined to embark on a heroic quest in this Malayalam version of S.S. Rajamouli's epic.
